metadata.title: CVE-2021-22213 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site leak vulnerability in the OAuth flow of all versions of GitLabCE/EE since 7.10 allowed an attacker to leak an OAuth access token bygetting the victim to visit a malicious page with Safari

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
